ygData.subject: Re: Twinkers are just plain idiots
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t quite follow this statement.  I find plenty of things interesting in the game that have nothing to do with items or twinking.  what interesting
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:53 AM 9/20/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
>
>with verant nerfing anything of interest in the game, I'm starting to
>thing that the only way to play is to twink....rather pathetic
>

I don't quite follow this statement. I find plenty of things interesting
in the game that have nothing to do with items or twinking. what interesting
things did verant nerf? kiting? well i personally don't find kiting
interesting
but that's just me. any specific examples of nerfing or is this just a
general
anti verant bash with no real substance?
